'''Beta 1.6.0.1''' is the first beta version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.6.0]], released on June 14, 2018,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360004787312-Minecraft-Beta-1-6-0-1-Xbox-One-Windows-10-Android-|title=Minecraft Beta - 1.6.0.1 (Xbox One/Windows 10/Android)}}</ref> which adds [[phantom]]s and [[barrier]]s and fixes several crashes and bugs.

== Additions ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Barrier JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Barrier]] '''
* Invisible like [[invisible bedrock]].
* Obtained only through the command {{cmd|give <player> barrier}}.
* Can be placed in [[Creative]] mode
* They are invisible in [[Survival]] mode and [[Adventure]] mode.

=== Items ===
'''[[Spawn Egg]]'''
* [[Phantom]]s.

=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:Phantom.png|32px]] [[Phantom]]'''
* Spawns in the night skies if a [[player]] hasn't slept in over three in-game days.
* {{Version exclusive}}: Drops [[leather]] upon death.
* {{Version exclusive}}: Sounds are affected by [[water]].
* Burns in sunlight.

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
'''[[Book and Quill]]'''
* Pages can now be turned using the controller bumper buttons.

=== General ===
* Menu and inventory tabs can now be navigated using the {{key|[}} and {{key|]}} keys (can be remapped in Settings).

== Fixes ==
* Fixed several crashes that occurred during gameplay.
* Fixed a crash that occurred when using Pick Block in a spot where a mob just died.
* Increased performance for menu load times.
* Fixed water flowing incorrectly from stairs that contained water source blocks.
* Top snow will now break once it hits water.
* Fixed received items disappearing after trading a renamed item with a [[villager]]. ({{bug|MCPE-33830}})
* [[Map]]s once again update properly when held in the main hand. ({{bug|MCPE-34169}})
* Players are now able to return to the [[Overworld]] if an end portal is on their spawn point.
* Lowered the volume of the 'punching air' sound effect.
* Fixed guardians spawning even when mob spawning is disabled. ({{bug|MCPE-34027}})
* Fixed strays and skeletons having trouble leaving the water to attack players.
* Food particles no longer gradually change position after swimming and will always come out of the player's mouth area. ({{bug|MCPE-33984}})
* [[Observer]]s will now detect changes with [[dropper]]s, dispensers, [[brewing stand]]s, [[farmland]], [[sapling]]s, [[sugar cane]], [[fire]], and [[grass block]]s.
* Items can once again be crafted from the recipe book while the Craftable filter is disabled and the player only has enough materials to craft a single recipe.
* Fixed the speed boost given by [[dolphin]]s being too slow when wearing armor with Depth [[Strider]].
* [[Wolves]] no longer get stuck attacking skeletons that are underwater.
* [[Donkey]]s and mules can now only be ridden by players after being tamed. ({{bug|MCPE-25737}})
* [[Blaze]]s now attack [[snow golem]]s ({{bug|MCPE-13191}})
* Using the '{{cmd|setblock}}' command on redstone components will now properly update and power the mechanism. ({{bug|MCPE-21218}})
* [[Command block]]s now correctly conduct redstone power. ({{bug|MCPE-33021}})
* Operator permissions are now granted to players when the host creates a world with Trust Player Permissions set to Operator.
* [[Bucket]]s now stack properly when getting ejected from crafting output.
* Experience orbs spawned with the '{{cmd|summon}}' command will now grant experience to players.
* The gamepad cursor can now be used to navigate villager trades. ({{bug|MCPE-33330}})
* Fixed overlapping issues with the dragon head equipped on the inventory screen.
* The crafting table's output field hover state now matches the field's size.
* Selecting the output of an uncraftable recipe no longer causes the output item to disappear.</onlyinclude>
